# Workflows

## Branch management

* **main**
  * ongoing development
  * docs are deployed to github pages
* `webpage`
  * pushes will trigger a deployment to `kaumei-jdbc.kaumei.io` 
* releases by tags (v*)
  * build all Github related release stuff
  * the release will be build manually and pushed manualles to
